oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Conquered banner

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Sheet music covers; Songs; Music
War songs; Confederate States of America - History; Ryan, Abram Joseph, 1839-1886; La Hache, Theod. von (Theodor), 1823-1867
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ten-page sheet music entitled "The Conquered Banner." Poem was written by Father Abram Joseph Ryan under his pseudonym, "Moina." Music was written by Theodore La Hache. The last page contains advertisements for A. E. Blackmar publications.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rose, Kenneth D.
